property.name: Lore
property.value: Aide to Admiral Motti's staff. Foul-tempered and vindictive. Feared by other droids. A spy for the ISB. Secretly investigates Imperial officers whose loyalties are in question.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: SERVANT DROID

property.name: GameText
property.value: Power +1 if at same site as Motti or Yularen. Deploy +1 for all opponent's droids (and your 'mouse' droids) at same location. Immune to attrition during 'night-time conditions'.

property.name: Lore
property.value: The destruction of Alderaan caused a great disturbance in the Force '...as if millions of voices suddenly cried out in terror and were suddenly silenced.'

property.name: GameText
property.value: During your deploy phase, 'insert' (face down) into opponent's Reserve Deck. Shuffle. Opponent cuts deck without looking. When Effect reaches top it is immediately lost, but opponent may not activate any more Force that turn. (Immune to Alter.)

property.name: Lore
property.value: Senior Navy Commander of Death Star. Believes in technology. Ridiculed the Force. Ambitious leader. Promoted due to support of New Order, not military skills. Hates Vader.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy -2 if at least two Imperial starships on table. Rebel pilots at same system with Motti have forfeit -1. Adds 2 to power of any starship he pilots.

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: If you control, Force drain +1 here for each Death Star site on table also in your control.

property.name: Lore
property.value: A user of the Force can subjugate the will of others or alter the environment at a distance, as when Vader 'disciplines' those whose lack of faith disturbs him.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Cancel one Effect (or Utinni Effect) by drawing a destiny < the ability of your highest-ability character on table. OR Cancel one Sense card just played.

property.name: Lore
property.value: BlasTech model DLT-19 'heavy blaster rifle.' Enhanced with extra power packs and greater range.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: CHARACTER WEAPON

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 3 Force to deploy on any warrior. May fire during a battle at same site or an adjacent site. Select target involved in battle for 2 Force. Draw destiny. Character hit if destiny+1 > ability.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Duros are famous spacers and starship engineers. Many are forced to work for the Empire. Some, like Baniss Keeg, train pilots for deep space missions.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on any non-pilot character (except droids) to give that character pilot icon/skill. Adds 2 to power of any starship that character pilots. OR Deploy on any pilot. Adds 1 to power of any starship that character pilots. (Immune to Alter.)

property.name: Lore
property.value: Transport, pack animal. Many breeds of different sizes and colors. Three meters tall. Can go weeks without food or water. Found throughout the galaxy.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: CREATURE VEHICLE

property.name: GameText
property.value: May carry 2 passengers. Bantha ability - 1/2. May move as a 'react' only to a battle or Force drain (if within range). Each Tusken Raider at same exterior site is power +1.

property.name: Lore
property.value: TIE/Ln assigned to pilot DS-61-2. Has 27 'flames' on cockpit, one for each Rebel kill. Control yoke has a holo of Mithel's young son, Rejlii.

property.name: SecondBox
property.value: NO HYPERDRIVE

property.name: GameText
property.value: May add 1 pilot. Must have pilot aboard to use power or Maneuver.

property.name: Lore
property.value: TIE/ln fighter of pilot DS-61-3. Stylized image of Corellian slice-hound painted on inner hatch.

property.name: SecondBox
property.value: NO HYPERDRIVE

property.name: GameText
property.value: May add 1 pilot. Must have a pilot aboard to use power or Maneuver.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Panels control blast doors and key security lock-downs during alerts. Luke destroyed one, locking Imperial forces out of Hangar Bay 327.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on your side of table. Cancels: Into The Garbage Chute, Flyboy; Narrow Escape; Blast The Door, Kid; and Rebel Barrier.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Imperial facilities like the Death Star and garrison bases have blaster racks at key locations to equip soldiers with weapons like blaster rifles and thermal detonators.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on your side of table. Any any time, you may move one of your character weapons from any site to the Blaster Rack. During your deploy phase, weapon may be re-deployed for an expenditure of Force equal to the weapon's deploy cost.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Stormtrooper BlasTech E-11 blaster rifle. Can convert from a pistol to a rifle configuration by using extendable stock. Carries 100 shots. Militaryissue only.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: CHARACTER WEAPON

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 2 Force to deploy on any warrior. May target using 2 Force. Draw destiny. Character hit if destiny+1 > ability. Vehicle hit if destiny+1 > maneuver or armor.

property.name: Lore
property.value: The effectiveness of a blaster can sometimes be enhanced through an electronic targeting scope mounted on top, especially for long range targets.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on an Imperial Blaster or Blaster Rifle. Where present during battle, scope allows that weapon to target any character or vehicle at an adjacent site.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Enhanced TIE blaster cannon prototype. Greater range and power. Improved targeting software. Requires more powerful energy cells. Tested by elite TIE squadrons.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: STARSHIP WEAPON

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force to deploy on any TIE advanced x1. May target using 1 Force. Draw destiny. Capital starship hit if destiny-1 > armor. Starfighter hit if destiny+1 > Maneuver.

property.name: Lore
property.value: 'Uh...had a slight weapons malfunction. But, uh, everything's perfectly all right now. We're fine. We're all fine here, now, thank you. How are you?'

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Cancel either: Report To Lord Vader, Scomp Link Access, Rebel Planners, Rebel Reinforcements, Gift Of The Mentor, Panic, Don't Get Cocky, Skywalkers, Demotion, Combined Attack or Surprise Assault.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Hand-held device that commands restraining bolt. Each caller can be keyed to a specific bolt. Used throughout the galaxy. Also called 'owners.'

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on any Imperial or Jawa. During your control phase, may steal one droid at same site if it is controlled by a Restraining Bolt. After droid is stolen, Restraining Bolt returns to owner's hand.

property.name: Lore
property.value: 'You're far too trusting. Dantooine is too remote to make an effective demonstration. But don't worry...We will deal with your Rebel friends soon enough.'

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If Tarkin and a Rebel with ability >2 are involved in the same battle, you may add one battle destiny (add two destiny if Rebel is Leia).

property.name: Lore
property.value: Aide to Grand Moff Tarkin. Rarely underestimates enemies. Learned cunning and patience hunting big game as a youth.

property.name: GameText
property.value: If aboard a starship at the start of a battle, can immediately evacuate with one other person to a related site. Power +1 if at same site as Tarkin. Adds 2 to power of any starship he pilots.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Blast vests and helmets with blast shields cannot protect Rebel soldiers from grenades, panel explosions and other combat hazards.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: An accident occurs at the beginning of a battle at any site where opponent has at least two characters and one weapon. Draw destiny. If destiny < number of opponent's characters at that site, one is lost. (Opponent's choice.)

property.name: Lore
property.value: Imperial Security Bureau (ISB) officer assigned to brief Tarkin. Also ordered to ensure absolute loyalty to the Emperor. Leader. Will stop at nothing to fulfill the Emperor's will.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Power +1 at the same site as Tarkin, Chief Bast or General Dodonna.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Hand-held communication device. Military comlinks have scrambling and variable frequency programming for secure communication during battles or emergencies.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Used 1 Force to deploy on any character. If opponent has just initiated a battle or Force drain at Comlink's location or an adjacent site, you may 'react' by deploying cards (at normal use of the Force) to that battle or Force drain location.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Vader's aide on the Devastator. Personally supervised search for Death Star plans on Tatooine by Vader's order. Was graduated with honors from Imperial Navy Academy on Carida.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Where present, C-3PO or R2-D2 cannot utilize 'game text.' Adds 2 to power of any starship he pilots. On Devastator, also adds 1 to hyperspeed.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Imperial stormtroopers use tactical training to regroup and mount a surprise counterattack, such as when they halted Han Solo's wild pursuit.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force to cancel a Force drain at one location. Draw one destiny for each character, starship and vehicle the opponent has prsent. Compare your destiny total to opponent's pwer total. Player with lowest total loses Force equal to the difference.

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: Your starships may move here as a 'react' (if within range) at any time during the opponent's turn.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Imperial leaders are ruthlessly effective when working together. Tarkin, Motti and Tagge presented a deadly combination as they plotted to 'crush the Rebellion.'

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If Tarkin and either Tagge or Motti are in a battle together, you may add two battle destiny. OR Cancel Restricted Deployment or Rebel Barrier.

property.name: Lore
property.value: After surviving Tarkin's extortion, kidnapping, threats of execution and the assault of the Interceptor droid, Princess Leia was asleep when her rescuers came.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Select one site under 'night-time conditions.' Target every character there (except droids) and draw one destiny each. If destiny > ability, character 'sleeps' (power, forfeit and ability =0, 'game text' unusable) until the end of your next turn, then lose Effect.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Multifaceted jewels focus light into a deadly blade. Projects a meter long beam of pure energy. A lightsaber is constructed personally by a Jedi as a part of training.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: CHARACTER WEAPON

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use X force to deploy on any warrior where X = (7-warrior's ability), and you may then use as follows: Add 1 Force drain where present. OR Target a character by using X Force. Draw two destiny. Character hit if total destiny > ability.

property.name: Lore
property.value: A Dark Lord's presence motivates Imperial troops. 'See to it personally, Commander.'

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If one of your Dark Jedi is present during any battle, use 1 Force to cause all other Imperials there to battle at double power.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Imperial TIE fighters, while easily damaged, are very fast and agile. Sophisticated tactics are executed to take advantage of Rebel X-wing and Y-wing weaknesses.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Add 2 to maneuver and 1 to power of any starfighter for the remainder of this turn. If it has hyperdrive, also add 2 to hyperspeed. (Interrupt may even affect the result immediately after a destiny draw targeting the starfighter's Maneuver.)

property.name: Lore
property.value: Dark Lord of the Sith. Servant of Emperor's. Encased in armor with cybernetic life support. Student of Obi-Wan Kenobi. Was the best starpilot in the galaxy. Cunning warrior.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: DARK JEDI

property.name: GameText
property.value: When in battle, adds 1 to each battle destiny. Adds 3 to power of any starship he pilots. Adds 4 to power and 3 to maneuver when piloting Vader's Custom TIE. Immune to attrition < 5.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Jawa adventurer and trader. Famous for taunting a krayt dragon and escaping to tell the tale. Wants to leave Tatooine to explore the galaxy.

property.name: GameText
property.value: * To deploy requires 2 Force from each players' Force Pile. Cannot deploy otherwise. Deploy only on Tatooine, but may move elsewhere. Power +2 at non-Tatooine sites.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Many Jawas were killed by stormtroopers searching for R2-D2. They used banthas and gaderffi sticks to feign a Tusken Raider attack, but Obi-Wan saw through the ruse.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If two or more Stormtroopers are present where the opponent has Jawas, target as many Jawas there as desired. Draw destiny. If destiny > the number of Jawas you targeted, they are immediately lost.

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: If you control, Wrong Turn and Retract The Bridge delploy for free.

property.name: LightLocationText
property.value: If you control, Force drain +1 here and Death Star Tractor Beam is cancelled.

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: Add 1 to each of your weapon destiny draws here.

property.name: LightLocationText
property.value: If you control, Force drain +1 here.

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: Your docking bay transit from here is free.

property.name: LightLocationText
property.value: Your docking bay transit from here requires 2 Force.

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: During your move phase, Imperials may move free from here to any one Death Star site.

property.name: LightLocationText
property.value: If you control, Force drain +1 here.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Death Star troopers on sentry duty observe and direct incoming starships and monitor other critical sites. They perform sensor scans for life forms and weapons.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 2 Force to deploy on any Death Star site. Declare one of the following to affect that site and adjacent sites while 'sentry' present: Opponent's deploy +1. OR Opponent's ability required for battle destiny +1. OR Your total power +1.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Elite soldiers trained in combat techniques and weapons skills. Devin Cant augmented security personnel guarding Princess Leia in Detention Block AA-23

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy only on Death Star, but may move elsewhere. Power -1 when at site other than a Death Star site.

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: If you control with a leader here, all Rebel Troopers and Y-wings on table are forfeit -1.

property.name: LightLocationText
property.value: If you initiate a battle here, add one battle destiny.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Supported the devastating subjugation of Ralltir. While under the command of Darth Vader, chased and captured the traitor Princess Leia Organa aboard the consular ship Tantive IV.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: CAPITAL: IMPERIAL-CLASS STAR DESTROYER

property.name: GameText
property.value: May add 6 pilots, 8 passengers, 2 vehicles and 4 TIE's. Has ship-docking capability. Permanent pilot aboard provides ability of 2.

property.name: Lore
property.value: C-3PO's arm was pulled off by attacking Tusken Raiders. 'I don't think I can make it. You go on, Master Luke...I'm done for.'

property.name: GameText
property.value: If both players have a character with a weapon at same site, deploy on that opponent's character during any control phase (even opponent's control phase). Character loses weapon, is power -1 and may no longer carry weapons. (Immune to Alter.)

property.name: Lore
property.value: Male Sakiyan, a race often employed as assassins. Bounty hunter. Incredible infrared peripheral vision. Has excellent aural and olfactory senses. Often tracks by scent.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Power +1 for each Dark Force icon present, +2 under 'night-time conditions.' Immune to attrition < 3.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Twisted 'doctor'. Disfigured by blaster. Has death sentence in over 12 systems. Notorious partner of Ponda Baba. Aliases: Dr. Cornelius and Rooboo.

property.name: GameText
property.value: The not-so-good doctor may immediately 'operate' on any hit or Disarmed character at same site. 'Patient' is immediately lost. Adds 2 to power of any starship he pilots.

property.name: Lore
property.value: To keep out the mechanicals he so detested, Wuher installed an automatic droid detector at the entrance to the Mos Eisley Cantina.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy at any interior site. Cannot be moved. All droids there must move away (at normal use of Force) by the end of the opponent's next turn, or they are lost. Droids may not deploy to same site and are lost if present at end of any turn.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Vader's left wingman. Flies Black 2. Specially trained pilot held in reserve for mission with Vader. Nicknamed 'Mauler Mithel.'

property.name: GameText
property.value: Adds 3 to power of any starship he pilots. On Black 2, also adds 1 to maneuver and may draw one battle destiny if not able to otherwise.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Vader's right wingman. Flies Black 3. Reputation for ferocity in combat. Corellian pilot with excellent skills. Nicknamed 'Backstabber.'

property.name: GameText
property.value: Adds 3 to power of any starship he pilots. On Black 3, also adds 1 to maneuver and may draw one battle destiny if not able to otherwise.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Ambulatory power generator made by Veril Line Systems to support equipment and vehicles. Slow-witted. This EG unit is memory-wiped and doesn't know its name or serial number.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: POWER DROID

property.name: GameText
property.value: Power +1 for each droid present, except power droids. * Destiny equals zero, but if drawn as a battle destiny where you have less power than opponent, your total power present is doubled (once per battle).

property.name: Lore
property.value: A Givin pilot who can seal his joints to withstand the vacuum of space. Makes slaving and spike runs to Kala'uun. Has made many special modifications to his ship, the Hinthra.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Any or all of your characters at one site may attempt to hire transport to any other site. Draw destiny to determine Elis' asking price. Accept transport by using that much Force. Decline transport and Elis leaves (to Lost Pile).

property.name: Lore
property.value: TIE fighters are stored in large racks far above the hangar deck. Catapulted into space by powerful tractor beam generators, TIEs can quickly scramble to engage the enemy.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If opponent just inititated a battle where opponent has more than double your power, draw up to 3 cards from your Reserve Deck. Of those 3, deploy anywhere (for free) any characters, starships, vehicles, devices or weapons. Any others are lost.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Escape pods are on many starships allowing those in peril to flee, an act considered cowardly by Imperial officers. 'We've analyzed their attack, sir, and there is a danger.'

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Unless Tarkin is aboard, save all characters, weapons and devices aboard any just-lost capital starship. Relocate them to any one panet site or to one of your capital starships.

property.name: Lore
property.value: The Emperor disbanded the Imperial Senate 'for the duration of the emergency,' seizing absolute power. He planned to extend rule by terrorizing planets into submission.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on any site. 'Expands' your 'game text' for that site to add your 'game text' at the adjacent sites.

card.name: Fear Will Keep Them In Line

property.name: Lore
property.value: 'The regional governors now have direct control over their territories. Fear will keep the local systems in line. Fear of this battle station.'

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on any capital starship. When that starship is at a system you control, your total power is +1 in battles at related sites.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Corrupt tax collector. A male Gotal. Bounty hunter. Once sought a bounty on Obi-Wan. Has limited sensing ability to droid emanations. Romanced M'iiyoom Onith.

property.name: GameText
property.value: To initiate battles at same location as Trevagg, player must use X Force, where X= total number of Dark Force icons and Light Force icons present. If a droid is present, Trevagg's 'game text' is unusable.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Imperial stormtroopers adopt strict security measures. Excellent communications and sheer numbers can hinder Rebel movement across entire territories.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 2 Force. Draw Destiny. If destiny < number of Stormtroopers on the table, all opponents movement is blocked for the remainder of this turn (except for smugglers and the starships they are aboard).

property.name: Lore
property.value: Installed at many facilities throughout the Empire to provide power to the Imperial spacefleet. Supplies starships with energy necessary for sublight and hyperspace travel.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on any starship at a system where a related docking bay site is on the table. Adds 1 to hyperspeed, power and Maneuver.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Notorious 'gaffi' weapon favored by Tusken Raiders. Built from scavenged metal. Intimidates and evokes fear.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: CHARACTER WEAPON

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 2 Force to deploy on any Tusken Raider. May target for free. If a battle has just been initiated where present, immediately draw two destiny. If total destiny >5, opponent's weapons are 'knocked away' (may not be used this battle).

property.name: Lore
property.value: Long-nosed, male Kubaz from Kubindi. Spy. Squealed on Obi-Wan and Luke outside Docking Bay 94. Works for Jabba the Hutt or the highest bidder. Not particularly brave.

property.name: GameText
property.value: When at same location as a Rebel of ability >2, deploy -1 there for any Imperials, and during your move phase, Imperials at an adjacent site may move there for free.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Oversees defense operations of Death Star. Outstanding tactician. No-nonsense leader. Member of the House of Tagge, a powerful noble family and corporate conglomerate.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Tagge's forfeit +1 for each Imperial Trooper, of any kind, present with him at a site.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Leader. Governor of Outer Rim Territories. Commanded Death Star. Helped disband Imperial Senate. Defined doctrine of rule by fear. Plotted to use Death Star against Emperor.

property.name: GameText
property.value: If with Vader in battle, may cancel one opponent's destiny draw immediately after it is revealed. Adds 2 to power of any starship he pilots.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Tatooine's twin suns cause turbulent storms that strike with little or no warning. Strong winds whip rocks through the air with enormous force.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Strikes at Dune Sea, Jundlan Wastes, Beggar's Canyon, Lars' Moisture Farm, Jawa Camp, or Mos Eisley. Target one opponent's character at that site. Draw destiny. Target lost if destiny > ability.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Military version of a 'remote.' Programmed to stalk specific targets or secondary targets. Heat and light sensors track with fatal accuracy. Can stow away on starships.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: AUTOMATED WEAPON

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force to deploy on an opponent's side at any unoccupied site. Moves during your control phase, like a character, at normal use of Force. When at same location as Han or alien of ability < 3, choose one to be immediately Lost. Seeker also lost.

card.name: I Find Your Lack Of Faith Disturbing

property.name: Lore
property.value: Darth Vader ruthlessly used the Force to strike down enemies and soldiers who displeased him. He could choke victims from afar without touching them.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force to deploy on one of your Dark Jedi. Opponent's total ability at same location is reduced by 2, unless an opponent's Jedi is also present.

property.name: Lore
property.value: 'Several fighters have broken off from the main group. Come with me.' Darth Vader targets his TIE fighter's fire-linked blaster cannons at the Rebel pilots in the trench.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If a Dark Jedi and a Rebel with ability >2 are involved in the same battle, you may add one battle destiny (add two destiny if Rebel is Luke).

property.name: Lore
property.value: As is often the case with a hasty plan, a quick heroic escape from the Death Star was temporarily thwarted by the magnetically sealed door in the trash compactor.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force to prevent any character or starship just deployed by the opponent from battling or moving for the remainder of this turn.

property.name: Lore
property.value: A BlasTech DH-17 blaster pistol. Uses power packs and high-energy blaster gases. Shoots bolts of explosive coherent light energy.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: CHARACTER WEAPON

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force to deploy on any warrior. May target using 1 Force. Draw destiny. Character hit if destiny > ability. Vehicle hit if destiny > maneuver or armor.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Mainstay of Imperial Navy. 1.6 kilometers long. Has hangars and facilities for TIE fighter squadrons, shuttles, drop-ships and combat vehicles such as AT-ATs and AT-ATs.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: CAPITAL: IMPERIAL-CLASS STAR DESTROYER

property.name: GameText
property.value: May add 6 pilots, 8 passengers, 2 vehicles and 4 TIE's. Has ship-docking capability. Permanent pilot aboard provides ability of 1.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Imperial officers are issued coded cylinders which access computer information via Scomp links. Each cylinder is coded to the officer's own security clearance.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If any Imperial leader is present with a Scomp link, you may: Glance at the cards in any Reserve Deck for 20 seconds. Shuffle, cut and replace. OR If also at a Death Star site, cancel Scomp Link Access or Into The Garbage Chute, Flyboy.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Among the Empire's best pilots. Loyal and fearless. Use superior numbers to overwhelm opponents. Trained under combat conditions. Wear sealed, high-gravity flight suits.

property.name: GameText
property.value: * Power = 0 when at any site, but adds 2 to power of any starship he pilots.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Imperial stormtroopers deploy in 8-10 trooper squads. Reinforcements are typically held in reserve according to standard Imperial operating procedures.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If opponent outnumbers you in total characters and starships on table, use 1 Force to draw destiny. That number of Stormtroopers and/or TIE fighters may be retrieved from the Lost Pile.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Elite soldiers trained in combat techniques and weapons skills. Death Star trooper Tajis Durmin is typical of those assigned to guard key areas of the Death Star.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Cannot move. * Power = 0 during an offensive battle, but Power = 4 when defending a battle.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Fires blasts of ionized energy. Causes massive disruptions in weapon, engine and computer systems aboard a target. Disables starship defenses against tractor beams.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: STARSHIP WEAPON

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 2 Force to deploy on any Star Destroyer. May target using 1 Force. Draw destiny. If destiny +2 > target's armor or maneuver, all weapons aboard target are lost, armor or maneuver = 0 and hyperspeed = 0.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Things went from bad to worse when Luke was attacked by a dianoga, a parasitic predator native to the planet Vodran.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If It Could Be Worse was just played, it is cancelled and you may use X Force to raise damage against opponent by X amount. OR If opponent has just lost Force from a battle, play to increase loss by 1 Force.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Debris fragments damaged Jek Porkins' X-wing, causing a cascade of computer and flight control failures.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force to target an opponent's starfighter at a system where a battle just finished. Draw destiny. Starfighter immediately lost if destiny > Maneuver.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force to attempt to knock out a starship's astromech or nav computer. Draw destiny. If destiny > 1, deploy on starship to reduce hyperspeed to zero.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Small, rodent-like scavenger species. Refurbish and sell droids. Nest in sandcrawlers. Considered to be pests by most species.

property.name: GameText
property.value: * To deploy requires 1 Force from each players' Force Pile. Cannot deploy otherwise. Deploy only on Tatooine, but may move elsewhere.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Jawas travel in packs for protection. They use ambush tactics against unwary droids in the canyons of the Jundland Wastes. 'Aeeeyaa!'

property.name: GameText
property.value: To deploy (on your side of table) requires 3 Force from both players' Force Piles. Cannot deploy otherwise. All your Jawas are forfeit +1.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Popular beverage served in many cantinas and tapcafes. Has intoxicating effect on many species. Favorite drink of Kabe, Chadra-Fan thief of Mos Eisley.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: UTINNI EFFECT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on any alien if Cantina, Mos Eisley or Jabba's Sail Barge on table. That alien may not use ability in battles (if Kabe, she also cannot 'steal'). Utinni effect cancelled by moving that alien to one of those sites without 'driving' a vehicle.

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: Your starships deploy -1 here, -2 if Tarkin is present. If you control, Kessel Run is prevented (cancelled).

property.name: LightLocationText
property.value: Total ability of 6 or more required for you to draw battle destiny here.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Assassins are highly valued by Jabba the Hutt and other gangsters. Prince Xizor's 'shadow killer,' has unknown but undoubtably lethal business in Mos Eisley.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on any non-warrior character (except droids) to give that character warrior skill. OR Deploy on any warrior. That character is power +1. (Immune to Alter).

property.name: Lore
property.value: A dejarik hologram of a ferocious creature with incredible healing abilities. Extinct on the homeworld of Kintan, but used as a guard beasts by many Hutt gangsters.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If opponent just forfeited or lost a character, use 1 Force to regenerate one of your own characters. Retrieve that character closest to the top of your Lost Pile into your hand.

property.name: Lore
property.value: A female insectoid Yam'rii. Very strong and easily angered. Known for stealth, but also has good technological aptitude. Meat eater. Loves eggs.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Immeidately lost if at same site as over-protective mother, Kal'Falnl C'ndros. Cannot board starfighters or enclosed vehicles.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Information broker. Spy. Devaronian males instinctively have 'wanderlust.' Frustrated that he must be reclusive due to shady past. Suffers from prejudice due to devilish appearance.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Once each turn, during your control phase, you may reveal the top card of your Reserve Deck to both players. If it is a vehicle or starship, card is immediately lost. Otherwise, return it to the top of your Reserve Deck, Force Pile or Used Pile.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Laser system activated by distress signal from guards. Used at security checkpoints and detention block control rooms. Targeting guided by centralized droid controller.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: AUTOMATED WEAPON

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 2 Force to deploy at an interior site. Cannot move. May target for free. Draw destiny. Character hit if destiny -1 > ability. Seeker hit if destiny >2. Laser projector may be targeted by another weapon and hit if destiny >1.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Starships can become damaged in combat and rendered ineffective until they can be repaired and re-outfitted.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: UTINNI EFFECT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on any system. Target an opponent's starship. Target's power and forfeit = 0. When target reaches Utinni Effect, target draws one destiny. Utinni Effect cancelled if destiny >2. Otherwise, draw again next move phase, etc.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Former fighter pilot grounded after injury. Tactical officer aboard Death Star. Competent strategist. Specializes in directing Imperial starfighters.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy -1 for starship weapons of any starship he pilots. Adds 2 to power of any starship he pilots, but subtracts 1 from maneuver of any starfighter he pilots.

property.name: Lore
property.value: System of enclosed high-speed vertical and horizontal transport cylinders. Used in space stations, large starships, Death Stars, etc.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: TRANSPORT VEHICLE

property.name: GameText
property.value: May carry 4 passengers. Deploy and move only at interior mobile sites. May move without a presence aboard. Also, may move as a 'react' only to a battle or Force drain (if within range).

property.name: Lore
property.value: BlasTech model T-21 light repeating blaster. Excellent power, good range. Carries energy for 25 shots. Unlimited firepower when attached to a power generator.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: CHARACTER WEAPON

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 2 Force to deploy on any warrior. If a power droid or any fusion generator present, may target using 2 Force. Draw destiny. Character hit if destiny +1 > ability. Vehicle hit if destiny +1 > maneuver or armor. May fire repeatedly for 2 Force each time.

property.name: Lore
property.value: The Empire dominates consumption of resources. Despite being efficient, Rebel logistical and maintenance officers often are compelled to expend emergency reserves.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If the opponent has two cards or less in hand, opponent must immediately lose 2 Force (4 Force if it is your turn). If the opponent has Fusion Generator Supply Tanks aboard a starship, loss is reduced by 2.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Armored military droid which specializes in laying explosive mines. Originally intended to set charges inside ore and spice mines, but has also been converted for military use.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: MINING DROID

property.name: GameText
property.value: Lays mines. OR At any time during your turn, may use 1 Force to 'defuse' (lose) any one mine at same site.

property.name: Lore
property.value: 'Look like somebody's beginning to take an interest in your handiwork.' Imperial stormtroopers coerce local residents to assist them in the apprehension of Rebel scum.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force at the beginning of your battle phase to allow any two Stormtroopers in the Cantina to battle any one opponent's character (your choice). You may add one battle destiny. No other battles may occur in Cantina this turn.

property.name: Lore
property.value: One lone TIE fighter, acting as a scout near the Death Star, suddenly encountered the Millennium Falcon.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If any pilot (or permanent pilot) is defending a battle alone at a system, add one battle destiny. OR If Motti is defending a battle alone at a system, add two battle destiny.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Though generally deployed in squads, all Imperial warriors are trained in the close combat techniques and have a reputation for ferocity when cornered.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If any warrior is defending a battle alone at a site, add one battle destiny. OR If Tagge is defending a battle alone at a site, add two battle destiny.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Trooper 1124, Davin Felth, discovered droid plating dropped by R2- D2 and C-3PO when exiting escape pod.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force to search through the opponent's Used Pile and move any droids you find there to opponent's Lost Pile. OR Use X Force to destroy any one droid on table where X = droid's deploy cost.

property.name: Lore
property.value: 'All right. I'll be right there, Aunt Beru.'

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: UTINNI EFFECT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on any Tatooine site. Target any Rebel. Target is power and forfeit -1 (-3 if target is Luke). If Rebel's forfeit reaches zero, Rebel is lost. Utinni effect cancelled when reached by target.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Military version of a 'remote.' Programmed to stalk specific targets or secondary targets. Heat and light sensors track with fatal accuracy. Can stow away on starships.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: AUTOMATED WEAPON

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force to deploy on opponent's side at any unoccupied site. Moves during your control phase, like a character, with normal use of the Force. When at same location as Luke or pilot with ability < 3, choose one to be immediately lost. Seeker is also lost.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Electrobinocular view. Readouts list object's true and relative azimuth, elevation and range. Built-in night vision.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 2 Force to deploy near opponent's Reserve Deck. At any time, you may use 1 Force to peek at the top card of that deck. If 'night-time conditions' exist anywhere on the table, you may peek at the top three cards.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Female H'nemthe, a species whose females ritually kill their mates. Stranded on Tatooine due to questionable passage tax. Razor-sharp tongue. M'iiyoom means, 'nightlilly'.

property.name: GameText
property.value: During your control phase may cause opponent to reveal entire hand by using X Force, where X = number of cards in opponent's hand. All unique (*) male Rebels or unique (*) male aliens there are lost.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Creature in dejarik hologame drawn from Alderaanian mythology. Stories describe molators as powerful, enchanted protectors of Alderaanian kings and queens.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on your side of table. For each unit of ability you have present during a battle, you may use 1 Force to raise your total power by 1. Ability used in this way cannot also be used to draw destiny.

property.name: Lore
property.value: A ruthless ruler of Outer Rim Territories. Grand Moff Tarkin used the Death Star to destroy Alderaan, creating the doctrine of rule by fear.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If Tarkin is defending a battle alone, add two battle destiny. OR If any alien is defending a battle alone, add one battle destiny.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Nicknamed for rodent-like appearance. Delivers orders and sensitive documents. Retractable manipulator arms. Made by Rebaxan Columni. Easily frightened.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: MESSENGER DROID

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on any character targeted by an Utinni Effect. Move 'mouse' droid, instead of that character, to pick up Utinni Effect and bring back to be fulfilled or cancelled. LandspeedHyperspeed=3. Upon delivery, 'mouse' droid returns to your hand.

property.name: Lore
property.value: A regenerating, primitive, violent, desert dwelling, fearless, mercenary-joining, Lirin Car'n-befriending, cyclopian Abyssin from Byss. Calling him 'monoc' will start a fight.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Power +1 if present with Lirin Car'n or any bounty hunter. If lost or forfeited as a result of a battle, Myo 'regenerates' (place on top of your Used Pile).

property.name: Lore
property.value: Immense Ranat scavenger from Aralia. Slyly spies for anyone willing to pay his price. Outcast. Works as a laborer for Hrchek, the Saurin droid trader.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If both players have a spy at the same site, draw destiny. Opponent's spy is lost if destiny >2. If spy is Undercover, it is lost if destiny >0.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Remote surveillance viewers with droid controllers supplement security. Can activate alarms and automated weapons when needed, bringing help to endangered locations.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy at any site. Cannot be moved. You may either: Add 1 weapon destiny for each of your automated weapons there or at adjacent sites. OR A character at an adjacent site you control may add its power to a battle at Holocam's site.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Difficult-to-play instrument which enhances music. Tech Mo'r plays one for Figrin D'an and the Modal Nodes in the Mos Eisley Cantina.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Shuffle any player's Reserve Deck or Lost Pile or Used Pile.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Necklace worn by Princess Leia during the awards ceremony after the Battle of Yavin. A powerful artifact in the Alderaanian royal family for dozens of generations.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: UTINNI EFFECT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on any Yavin 4 site. Target one Imperial. When Imperial reaches same site, 'steal' necklace. Whenever necklace is present during Force drain: add 1 to Force Drain an may then pass (for free) to an adjacent site you control (if any), and so on.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Weapons like lightsabers, turbolasers and blasters run on powerful energy cells or generators. Occasionally, these cells overheat causing the weapon to unexpectedly explode.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Target any weapon (except a Gaderffii Stick or any Ewok weapon). Draw destiny. Weapon lost if destiny < weapon's destiny number. If destiny = 0, the character or starship carrying weapon is also lost.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Darth Vader often used physical means of 'persuasion' to get information. Captain Antilles of Tantive IV chose to die rather than reveal the location of the stolen Death Star plans.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Cause one Rebel Trooper to be immediately lost. OR If a Dark Jedi is present at a battle you have just won, use 1 Force to attempt to choke any opposing character present. Draw destiny. If destiny > target's ability, target is lost.

property.name: Lore
property.value: A male Quara (or fingered Aqualish). Thug, smuggler and partner of Dr. Evazan. Has a poor quality cybernetic arm replacement.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Power +3 when battling at same site as Dr. Evazan, unless opponent has lightsaber weapon present. Adds 2 to power of any starship he pilots.

property.name: Lore
property.value: 'Only Imperial stormtroopers are so precise.'

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: During a battle at any site, target one character or vehicle by combining the destiny draws of two or more of your weapons at the same site.

property.name: Lore
property.value: A location is affected by the history of the events which occur there. The Force '...binds the galaxy together' and has an ebb and flow.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on any location to add one Dark Force icon and one Light Force icon.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Renowned female psychic. Predictor of doom. Agent for Governor Aryon of Tatooine. Tailed Jabba and his thugs to Docking Bay 94 when they confronted Han Solo

property.name: GameText
property.value: If you initiate a battle where present, you must predict the winner before the battle starts. If correct, randomly retrieve one lost card. If incorrect, lose 1 Force. Immune to attrition < 3.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Typical of the old model astromechs still used on capital starships and large freighters. Has armored Mark II reactor drone shell. R1-G4 was abandoned after owner was captured.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: ASTROMECH DROID

property.name: GameText
property.value: When aboard a capital starship, adds 1 to power and hyperspeed, and that starship is immune to attrition <. Too large to go aboard a starfighter.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Typical multiple-use droid. Controls and repairs vehicles and computers. R4-M9 was once used by the Empire to pull data from Tantive IV's computer banks.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: VEHICLE REPAIR DROID

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on a vehicle (except creature vehicle) to add 1 to power, maneuver and landspeed. May remain aboard and drive vehicle by itself, without presence. No astromech capability.

property.name: Lore
property.value: The Death Star has many terminals coupled to the main reactor for power distribution throughout the immense space station.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force to deploy on your side fo the table. During your control phase, you may return any cards from your hand to the top of your Used Pile.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Affixed to droid's special recessed socket by using a fusion welder. Bolts can override a droid's circuits, freezing it in place if the droid tries to disobey orders.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on any droid at any site. Droid cannot move and cannot utilize its 'game text.' During your deploy phase, Restraining Bolt may be transferred (for free) to another droid at same site.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Warren-like enclosed homes for Jawa tribes. Protect against Tusken Raiders, krayt dragons, etc. 36 meters longs, 17 meters tall. Originally mining vehicles. No two look alike.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: TRANSPORT VEHICLE

property.name: GameText
property.value: May carry 8 passengers. Must deploy at a Tatooine site. May relocate only to planet sites. Each Jawa at same exterior site is forfeit +1.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Imperials use sensitive equipment to search captured ships for shielded compartments. Scanning crew BT-445 planned to search the Millennium Falcon

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force to glance at the cards in the opponent's hand for 10 seconds. You may move any one Rebel you find there to the top of the opponent's Used Pile.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Vader sent Imperial stormtroopers to the surface of Tatooine in search of the stolen Death Star plans. 'There'll be no one to stop us this time.'

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: UTINNI EFFECT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 2 Force to deploy on any Tatooine site (except docking bay). Target any trooper on Death Star. When target reaches Utinni Effect, attrition +1 against opponents in all Tatooine battles as long as target remains at same site as Utinni effect.

property.name: Lore
property.value: 'I sense something. A presence I've not felt since...'

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Cancel one Interrupt (or one 'react') by drawing a destiny < ability of your highest-ability character on table. OR Cancel one Alter card just played.

property.name: Lore
property.value: '...bring me the passengers. I want them alive!' Imperial soldiers use blaster stun settings to intimidate or to capture prisoners for questioning and interrogation.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 2 Force to target one opponent's character. Draw destiny. If destiny > character's ability, character immediately returns to opponent's hand. (Also, any cards deployed on character return to owner's hands.)

property.name: Lore
property.value: One of the countless elite shock troops totally loyal to the Emperor. Unquestioningly follows orders. Willing to sacrifice their lives to accomplish a mission. First-strike force.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploys free to same site as one of your Imperials with ability >2.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Standard-issue Imperial equipment with full survival and encampment gear, plus ammunition and food for an extended deployment. Makes each trooper self-sufficient.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on any trooper. May carry and use any number of weapons and devices. Trooper is immune to attrition < 3 when at a planet site.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Standard Imperial issue for stormtroopers. Contains grappling hook, rope, and other miscellaneous emergency tools. Rebels have been known to steal and use them.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force to deploy on any Imperial to alien. Character's power and forfeit are +1. If on Death Star, power and forfeit are +2.

property.name: Lore
property.value: When the twin suns of Tatooine set. 'Sand People or worse' become a threat, and battles are more dangerous. On Hoth, temperatures drop to deadly extremes.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on any planet system to cause 'night-time conditions' at related sites. During battles there, both sides add one destiny to power only. Spies deploy free to sites under 'night-time conditions'.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Sophisticated communication equipment hidden in the ruins of the extinct Massassi race is used to coordinate forces and to re-call Rebel officers for debriefing and orders.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: UTINNI EFFECT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on any Yavin 4 site immediately after winning a battle elsewhere. Target a warrior involved in that battle. Target's power and forfeit are -2 (-3 if Leia) until target reaches this Utinni effect (which is then cancelled).

property.name: Lore
property.value: Takeel, a burned-out Snivvian mercenary known as a double-crosser. Spice addicted. Frequents the Cantina looking for work, but has also turned lawbreakers over to the Empire.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If both players just drew one battle destiny, use 1 Force to switch numbers.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Maneuver named after Adar Tallon, tactician of the Old Republic who revolutionized starfighter combat. Pursuing fighter rolls and turns, maintaining speed and target lock.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Target two starfighters at same system (one Rebel, one Imperial). Each player draws destiny. Opponent totals destiny and starship's power. You total destiny, starship's power and starship's maneuver. Lowest total immediately loses starfighter.

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: Your aliens here except Tusken Raiders are each power +1.

property.name: LightLocationText
property.value: Your aliens here are each forfeit +1.

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: Your docking bay transit from here requires 1 Force.

property.name: LightLocationText
property.value: Your docking bay transit from here requires 2 Force.

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: If you control, for each of your starships here, your total power is +1 in battles at Tatooine sites.

property.name: LightLocationText
property.value: If you control, for each of your starships here, your total power is +1 in battles at Tatooine sites.

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: Your Jawas deploy here for 1 Force from you only.

property.name: LightLocationText
property.value: All your Jawas are power and forfeit -1 here.

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: Your Tusken Raiders here are each forfeit +1. If you control, Force drain +1 here.

property.name: LightLocationText
property.value: Total ability of 6 or more required for you to draw battle destiny here.

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: Add 1 to each of your weapon destiny draws here. If you control, Force drain +1 here.

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: Your spies, thieves, bounty hunters and smugglers are each power and forfeit +1 here.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Vader and Obi-Wan Kenobi fought a final lightsaber duel near Hangar Bay 327 on the Death Star. 'When I left you I was but the learner; now I am the master.'

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If Vader and Obi-Wan are at same site, use 1 Force to initiate a duel between them. Either Jedi is power +2 if they have a lightsaber. Loser of the battle is out of play, and he (the same persona) may not be deployed for the remainder of the game.

property.name: Lore
property.value: 'No star system will dare oppose the Emperor now.'

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If Vader, Tarkin, Motti, or Tagge is lost, use 2 Force to retrieve one of them from the Lost Pile. OR Use 4 Force to search through your Reserve Deck and take Vader, Tarkin, Motti, or Tagge into your hand. Shuffle deck, cut and replace.

property.name: Lore
property.value: TIE advanced x1 fighter boasting improved power plant, stronger shields, armored hull and enhanced weapons. Deployed to elite Imperial Navy pilots.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: STARFIGHTER: TIE ADVANCED X1

property.name: SecondBox
property.value: NO HYPERDRIVE

property.name: GameText
property.value: Permanent pilot aboard provides ability of 1.

property.name: Lore
property.value: TIE or Twin Ion Engine. TIE/ln model is Empire's most common fighter. Quick and Maneuverable. Solar-panel wings supplement power generator. Built by Sienar Fleet Systems.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: STARFIGHTER: TIE/LN

property.name: SecondBox
property.value: NO HYPERDRIVE

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy -1 to same system as any Imperial capital starship. Permanent pilot aboard provides ability of 1.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Limited production, light reconnaissance starship. Minimal armor and weapons. Long-range sensor and communications array. Scouts for Rebel activity

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: STARFIGHTER: TIE/SR

property.name: GameText
property.value: May add 1 pilot and 1 passenger, or 2 passengers. Permanent pilot aboard provides ability of 1.

property.name: Lore
property.value: A timer-activated explosive device designed to be placed by a mining droid. Originally used in ore and spice mines for demolition. Altered for military use.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: AUTOMATED WEAPON

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on opponent's side at the same site as one of your mining droids. 'Explodes' at the beginning of your next turn. Draw destiny. That number of opponent's characters there are immediately lost (owners choice). Timer mine also lost.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Twins. Thieves. Con artists. Spies. Swindlers. Double agents. Brea and Senni use their natural charm to sway the unwary on the fringe of society.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Twice each turn during your control phase, you may use 2 Force to draw 2 destiny for 2 chances at a destiny = 2. If successful, may steal or destroy up to 2 weapons or 2 devices present. (Sisters are targeted as one character, but require double Force to move.)

property.name: Lore
property.value: A Stennes Shifter, a near-human race. Have ability to blend unnoticed into crowds. Trinto profits from turning lawbreakers over to Imperial authorities.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If there are cards in the opponent's Used Pile during your battle phase, draw one destiny. All cards there with the same destiny number are lost.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Imperial troopers are fearless and totally indoctrinated. Backed by the most powerful weapons and starships in the galaxy, they tend to consider themselves invincible.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Select one of your trooopers in a battle to make a 'charge'. If that trooper is a Death Star Trooper, it is power +3 this battle. If any other trooper, power +2. However, that trooper must be forfeited at end of battle.

property.name: Lore
property.value: High-powered blasters. Require power generators, cryogenic cooling units and large crews. More effective against capital starships than starfighters.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: STARSHIP WEAPON

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 3 Force to deploy on any Star Destroyer or any mobile system. May target using 2 Force. Draw two destiny. Capital starship hit if total destiny -2 > armor. Starfighter hit is total destiny -5 > maneuver.

property.name: Lore
property.value: 'Sand People.' Ride banthas. Wield gaderffi (gaffi) sticks. Wear eye protectors and breath masks. Violent, nomadic, desert survival experts. 'Urrrg! Ur Ur Uur!'

property.name: GameText
property.value: * Total power of a group of Tusken Raiders depends on how many are present. One has a total power of 1, two=3, three=6, four=10. Limit of four at one site. Deploy only to Tatooine, but may move elsewhere.

property.name: Lore
property.value: 'Sand People always ride single file to hide their numbers.' They frequently attack strangers as they scavenge for useful equipment. Looted Luke's Landspeeder.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force to draw destiny. If destiny < the number of Tusken Raiders on table, you may scavenge (search through) the opponent's Used Pile. All vehicles, weapons or devices you find there are lost.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Enclosed repulsorlift Landspeeder. Micro-thrusters placed around spherical hull. Seats three. Extremely maneuverable. Top speed of 160 km per hour.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: TRANSPORT VEHICLE

property.name: GameText
property.value: May carry 3 passengers. Also, may move as a 'react' only to a battle or Force drain (if within range).

property.name: Lore
property.value: The Jawa who shot R2-D2 with an ionization gun called to his companions, 'Utinni!', the Jawa word for 'come here!'

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If one of your Jawas is at the same location as any Utinni Effect, 'steal' that Utinni Effect into your hand, to use or lose as your own. OR Cancel any Interrupt or Effect with 'Jawa' in the card name.

property.name: Lore
property.value: TIE advanced x1 prototype. First of a limited production run leading to the development of the TIE Interceptor. At Vader's insistence a hyperdrive was installed.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: STARFIGHTER: TIE ADVANCED x1

property.name: GameText
property.value: May add 1 pilot. If Vader is pilot, Custom TIE is immune to attrition < 4. Must have pilot aboard to use power, maneuver or hyperspeed.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Darth Vader's armored mask and life-support system provide him with extraordinary physical protection in duels and battles, in addition to his Dark Jedi combat skill.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If Vader is defending a battle alone at a site, add 1 to power and add one to battle destiny. OR If any other Imperial with ability >2 is defending a battle alone at a site, add one battle destiny.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Custom-built by Darth Vader. After the Clone Wars, he wielded this weapon while hunting down the last of the Jedi. Cuts through almost anything except another lightsaber blade.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: CHARACTER WEAPON

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy only on Vader (for free), and you may then use as follows: Add 1 to Force drain where present. OR Target a character for free. Draw two destiny. Character hit and its forfeit = 0 if total destiny > ability.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Standard treadwell droid. This one, also known as 'Eyesixsixtoo', is typical of the thousands of droids which repair and maintain heavy machinery and starfighters.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: MAINTENANCE DROID

property.name: GameText
property.value: All your vehicles and droids at same location are immune to attrition < 2. Also, if 'treadwell' droid is at a docking bay, all your starfighters at the related system are immune to attrition < 3.

card.name: We're All Gonna Be A Lot Thinner

property.name: Lore
property.value: Trash compactors crush waste before it is jettisoned into space. Magnetically sealed to prevent leakage. R2-D2 saved the day by shutting down compactor 3263827.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Everything in Trash Compactor is crushed (lost).

property.name: Lore
property.value: Imperial troopers use tactics to strand and cut off fugitives. Only daring and unpredictable actions gave Luke and Leia a chance to escape.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 3 Force to deploy on opponent's side of table. All opponent's warriors are deploy +1.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Gruff, surly, no-blasters-allowed bartender. Hates droids. 'We don't serve their kind here.' Wants to concoct the perfect drink for Jabba so he can work as his personal bartender.

property.name: GameText
property.value: If at the beginning of your control phase any weapons or droids are present at same site, all of them are lost. If in the Cantina, all weapons and droids there are immediately lost.

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: If you control, for each of your starships here, your total power is +1 in battles at Yavin 4 sites.

property.name: LightLocationText
property.value: If you control, for each of your starships here, your total power is +1 in battles at Yavin 4 sites.

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: Your docking bay transit from here requires 1 Force.

property.name: LightLocationText
property.value: Your docking bay transit from here requires 1 Force.

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: An Imperial alone here battles at power +2 and is immune to attrition.

property.name: Lore
property.value: 'Evacuate? In our moment of triumph?'

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If an opponent has just initiated a battle, triple the resulting battle damage for the eventual loser. OR Triple the result of Don't Underestimate Our Chances.

property.name: Lore
property.value: 'With this blast shield down, I can't even see. How am I supposed to fight?'

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy beside either player's Lost Pile. That pile is turned face down. Cards from that player's Life Force may not be viewed when they are lost.

card.name: Your Powers Are Weak, Old Man

property.name: Lore
property.value: 'You should not have come back.'

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: During any battle involving both Vader and Obi-Wan, you may add one battle destiny. OR Destroy (cancel) either: Return Of A Jedi, Jedi Lightsaber, Jedi Presence, or Old Ben.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Simple maintenance and diagnostics droid. Activates alarm sensors, security lighting and power fences on remote installations. KPR servant droids built by Lerrimore Droids.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: SECURITY PATROL DROID

property.name: GameText
property.value: Where present under 'night-time conditions,' each of your Rebels and aliens at the same planet site are power +2, and also have immunity to attrition <3 if a Hydroponics Station is present.

property.name: Lore
property.value: '...I know a few maneuvers. We'll lose them.' Boosted shields and fancy flying are necessary to escape Imperial weapon fire until hyperspace jump can be made.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Add 2 to hyperspeed and maneuver of any starfighter for the remainder of this turn. (Interrupt may even affect the result immediately after a destiny draw targeting the starfighter's maneuver.)

property.name: Lore
property.value: 'What was that?' The Jedi power known as 'affect mind' is often used to create minor distractions, allowing Jedi to elude enemies rather than engage them in battle.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force to deploy on one of your Jedi. Unless a Dark Jedi is also present, opponent's total ability at same location is reduced by 2.

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: If you control, Force drain +1 here.

property.name: LightLocationText
property.value: Subtract 1 from each of opponent's battle destiny draws here.

property.name: Lore
property.value: A user of the Force can alter the environment to affect the minds of others. 'The Force can have a strong influence on the weak-minded.'

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Cancel one effect (or Utinni Effect) by drawing a destiny < ability of your highest-ability character on the table. OR Cancel one Sense card just played.

property.name: Lore
property.value: 'Stand By...'

property.name: GameText
property.value: During your deploy phase, 'insert' (face down) in opponent's Reserve Deck. Shuffle. Opponent cuts deck without looking. When Effect reaches top it is immediately lost, but opponent may not activate any more Force that turn. (Immune to Alter)

property.name: Lore
property.value: Many Mos Eisley citizens, once swindled and robbed, become destitute. Unable to afford off-planet passage, they live in the streets and do odd jobs or beg.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 3 Force to deploy on any exterior Tattoine site (free at Beggar's Canyon). You may use any amount of Force in the opponent's Force Pile during your turns. However, if you use more than 1 of the opponent's Force in a turn, Beggar is lost.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Wife of Owen Lars and guardian of Luke Skywalker. Quietly lobbied Owen to allow Luke to attend Academy. Maintains Lars' farm hydroponics labs

property.name: GameText
property.value: Forfeit +2 when at same site as Owen Lars or one Hydroponics Station. If lost during the opponent's turn, Luke is power +3 until the end of your next turn.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Moisture farmers grow enough food to sustain Tatooine's population. Beru Lars has devised many dishes using herbs and roots naturally found in Tatooine's desert.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Each player must immediately activate 2 Force. Also, you may activate 1 additional Force for each Beru Lars, Owen Lars or Hydroponics Station on table.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Piloted Red 3 at Battle of Yavin. Childhood friend of Luke. Led mutiny on Rand Ecliptic and theft of Ecliptic from shipyards on Bestine. Ecliptic Evaders emblem on helmet.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Adds 2 to power of any starship he pilots. On Red 3, also adds 1 to maneuver and draws one battle destiny if not able to do otherwise.

property.name: Lore
property.value: A Merr-Sonn Model 44 blaster pistol. Uses power packs and highenergy blaster gases to shoot bolts of explosive coherent light energy.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: CHARACTER WEAPON

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force to deploy on any warrior. May target using 1 Force. Draw destiny. Character hit if destiny > ability. Vehicle hit if destiny > maneuver or armor.

property.name: Lore
property.value: BlasTech E-11 blaster rifle. Standard issue for Imperial forces. So numerous that many have been stolen by Rebels. Extendable stock. Carries energy for 100 shots.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: CHARACTER WEAPON

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 2 Force to deploy on any warrior. May target using 2 Force. Draw destiny. Character hit if destiny +1 > ability. Vehicle hit if destiny+1 > maneuver or armor.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Rogue pilot. Outlaw starship tech. Has secret lab in Mos Eisley. He bragged about beating Han Solo's Kessel Run record. Left fringe life behind after meeting Obi-Wan Kenobi.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Adds 3 to power of any starship he pilots. May make a Kessel Run in place of a smuggler. Immune to attrition <3.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Cybot Galactica 3PO human-cyborg relations droid. Fluent in over six million forms of communication. 112 years old. Has never been memorywiped... as far as he knows.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: PROTOCOL DROID

property.name: GameText
property.value: Total power at same site is +2 for each of your droid/Rebel pairs present, including C-3PO. R2-D2 is forfeit +2 when present.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Hand-held device that can remotely command restraining bolt. Each caller can be keyed to specific bolt. Used by many species. Also called 'restraining bolt activators.'

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on a Rebel or Jawa. During your control phase, may steal one droid at same site if it is controlled by a Restraining Bolt. After droid is stolen, Restraining Bolt returns to owner's hand.

property.name: Lore
property.value: '...watch your step. This place can be a little rough.' The Mos Eisley Cantina harbors smugglers, thieves, cutthroats, criminals and bounty hunters!

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 2 Force to cause a fight to break out in the Cantina. Both players draw destiny. All characters in Cantina with an ability number matching either destiny draw are lost.

property.name: Lore
property.value: High-speed collisions are a constant danger during chaotic starfighter dogfights. Scanners can be jammed. Pilots rely on vision, increasing the chances of such accidents.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force to play at a system where opponent has at least two starships. Draw destiny. If destiny < number of opponent's starships there, one is lost (opponent's choice).

property.name: Lore
property.value: Efficient cooperation allowed the Rebels to coordinate the attack of their small starfighters effectively at the Battle of Yavin.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: During a battle at any system, target one starship by combining the destiny draws of two or more of your starship weapons at same system.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Multi-purpose Rebel Blockade Runner. Modular interior designed for troop or cargo transport. 150 meters long. Used by Rebels, pirates, corporations and the Empire.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: CAPITAL: CORVETTE

property.name: GameText
property.value: May add 3 pilots, 4 passengers and 1 vehicle. Has ship-docking capability. Permanent pilot aboard provides ability of 1.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Mos Eisley was built around wreckage of the colony ship Dowager Queen. The wreck remains as a monument where residents leave junk for Jawa scavengers.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on your side of table. You may place lost vehicles, droids, weapons and devices here instead of Lost Pile. Once each turn, during your deploy phase, you may exchange any one hand card with one card from your 'memorial'.

property.name: Lore
property.value: CZ comm droid built by Serv-O-Droid. Outdated but still commonly in use. Built-in comlink. Sophisticated scramblers and encryption programming.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: COMMUNICATIONS DROID

property.name: GameText
property.value: If opponent has just initiated a battle or Force drain at CZ-3's location or an adjacent site, you may 'react' by deploying cards (at normal use of Force) to that battle or Force drain location.

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: If you control, Force drain +1 here.

property.name: LightLocationText
property.value: Your capital starships deploy -2 and your starfighters deploy -1 here.

property.name: LightLocationText
property.value: If you control, Force drain +1 here and all captured characters on Death Star are released.

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: Your docking bay transit from here requires 1 Force.

property.name: LightLocationText
property.value: Your docking bay transit from here requires 1 Force.

property.name: Lore
property.value: 'What's so important? What's he carrying?' 'The technical readouts of that battle station. I only hope that when the data is analyzed, a weakness can be found.'

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: UTINNI EFFECT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on any Death Star site (except docking bay). Target one of your droids, not on Death Star. When target reaches Utinni Effect, 'steal' plans. If target then moves to any Yavin 4 site, draw three destiny. Retrieve that much lost Force. Lost Utinni Effect.

property.name: LightLocationText
property.value: You may deploy here without presence. If you control, Force drain +1 here.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Repercussions for failure are severe in the Imperial military. Many officers prefer demotion to 'alternative' punishment from Darth Vader.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 2 Force to deploy on any Imperial, except Darth Vader, Emperor Palpatine or Stormtrooper. That Imperial is power -2 and cannot use its 'game text.'

property.name: Lore
property.value: Female companion of Lak Sivrak. A Florn lamproid. Dangerous predator with a poison stinger. Rumored to have mysterious time-shifting attunement to the Force.

property.name: GameText
property.value: If present where an opponent's character just fired a weapon, may use 1 Force to utilize Dice's poison stinger (once per turn). Target that character and draw destiny. If destiny = ability, target is 'hit'.

property.name: Lore
property.value: When Dr. Evazan and Ponda Baba confronted Luke in the Cantina, Obi-Wan pointed out, 'This little one isn't worth the effort.' A brawl ensued.

property.name: GameText
property.value: If both players have a character with a weapon at same site, deploy on the opponent's character during any control phase (even opponent's control phase). Character loses weapon, is power -1 and may no longer carry weapons. (Immune to Alter.)

property.name: Lore
property.value: Luke and Han made an effective team when defending the Millennium Falcon with its quad laser cannons against attacking TIE fighters. 'Great kid! Don't get cocky.'

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If Luke and Han are in a battle together, you may add two battle destiny. OR If the opponent just initiated a battle at any system, destroy (lose) one TIE Fighter of your choice at that system.

property.name: Lore
property.value: 'Stand-by alert. Death Star approaching. Estimated time to firing range, fifteen minutes.'

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If an opponent has just initiated a battle, triple the resulting battle damage for the eventual loser. OR Triple the result of You Overestimate Their Chances.

property.name: Lore
property.value: If low on energy and unable to recharge, a droid can shutdown active systems to conserve power.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Cancel any attempt to steal, destroy or capture one of your droids. Droid is protected for remainder of this turn.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Jon 'Dutch' Vander. Gold Squadron leader at Battle of Yavin. Prefers Y-wing fighters. Previously led squadron at Renforra Base. Emblem of Specter Squadron on his helmet.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Adds 2 to power of any starship he pilots. On Gold 1, also adds 1 to maneuver and draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise. Forfeit +1 to all other Gold Squadron pilots at same location.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Enhances distant targets using a computer-assisted zoom technology. Provides range information. Works in low-light. Rugged case protects the internal systems.

property.name: GameText
