property.value: Use 1 Force to deploy on any warrior. At any time, you may peek at the top card of your Reserve Deck by using 2 Force. You may choose to move that card to the top of your Force Pile.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Like many Duros, Madak has natural piloting and navigation skill. Former scout. Freelance instructor. Makes runs to important trade worlds Celanon, Byblos and Yaga Minor.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on any non-pilot character (except droids) to give that character pilot skill. Adds 2 to power of any starship that character pilots. OR Deploy on any pilot. Adds 1 to power of any starship that character pilots. (Immune to Alter.)

property.name: Lore
property.value: Capital starships have emergency escape pods. Equipped with food, water, flares, medpacs, hunting blaster and tracking beacon (R2-D2 deactivated this one's beacon).

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Save all characters, weapons, and devices aboard any just-lost capital starship. Relocate them to any planet site.

property.name: Lore
property.value: 'I don't like the look of this.'

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy beside either player's Lost Pile. That pile is turned face down. Cards from that player's Life Force may not be viewed when they are lost.

property.name: Lore
property.value: A male Bith. Musician who leads the Mos Eisley Cantina band, Figrin D'an and the Modal Nodes. Expert gambler and card shark.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Once each turn during your control phase, you may use 1 Force to make a 'wager'. Draw three destiny. Opponent draws two destiny. Player with highest total may randomly select one card to be retrieved from that player's Lost Pile.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Overcrowding in heavy fire zones increases chances of accidentally shooting one's own comrades. Stormtroopers never let accuracy get in the way of victory.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: An accident occurs at the beginning of a battle at any site where opponent has at least two characters and one weapon. Draw destiny. If destiny < number of opponent's characters at that site, one is lost. (Opponent's choice.)

property.name: Lore
property.value: Rebel pilots use visual scanning to supplement sensors for an edge against Imperial fighter pilots. Natural instincts allow lone Rebels to overcome superior numbers.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If any pilot (or permanent pilot) is defending a battle alone at a system, add one battle destiny. OR If Luke is defending a battle alone at a system, add 1 to power and add one to battle destiny.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Uses standard fusion technology. Provides starships with energy for hyperspace travel. Installed at docking bays and throughout the Outer Rim Territories.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on any starship at a system where a related docking bay site is on the table. Adds 1 to hyperspeed, power and maneuver.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Skilled tactician and natural leader. Planned attack on Death Star after analyzing technical readouts provided by Princess Leia. Star Destroyer captain during Old Republic.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Increases Rebel Planners by 1, doubles if at same site. May use 1 Force to cancel Wrong Turn. Each Rebel present with him at a Yavin 4 site is power +1.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Luke relied on Obi-Wan's knowledge and advice to learn the ways of the Force. Obi-Wan continued to counsel Luke long after the old Jedi's apparent 'death.'

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If Luke and Obi-Wan or Yoda are in a battle together, you may add two battle destiny. OR Use 1 Force to search through your Reserve Deck and take any one Lightsaber into your hand. Shuffle deck, cut and replace.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Lead fighter of Gold Squadron at Battle of Yavin. Flown by Jon 'Dutch' Vander. Designated Specter 1 at Renforra Base.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: STARFIGHTER: Y-WING

property.name: GameText
property.value: May add 2 pilots or passengers. Must have pilot aboard to use power, maneuver or hyperspeed.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Flown by the veteran Rebel fighter pilot Pops during the Battle of Yavin. He personally supervised all repairs and maintenance

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: STARFIGHTER: Y-WING

property.name: GameText
property.value: May add 2 pilots or passengers, and 1 astromech. Must have a pilot aboard to use power, maneuver or hyperspeed.

property.name: Lore
property.value: 'Didn't we just leave this party?'

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If Han is lost, use 1 Force to retrieve him from the Lost Pile. OR Use 3 Force to search through your Reserve Deck and take Han into your hand. Shuffle deck, cut and replace.

property.name: Lore
property.value: A pair of dice dangling above Millennium Falcon's cockpit, for luck. 'I've never seen anything to make me believe there's one, all-powerful Force controlling everything.'

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If one of your characters of ability >2 is in a battle, use 1 Force to draw another battle destiny instead of the one you just drew.

property.name: Lore
property.value: BlasTech DL-44 heavy pistol. Short range, but relatively powerful. Carries energy for 25 shots. Illegal or restricted on most systems.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: CHARACTER WEAPON

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force to deploy on Han, 3 on any other warrior. May target using 1 Force. Draw destiny. Character hit if destiny+1 > maneuver or armor. If hit by Han, target's forfeit =0.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Smuggler, gambler and 'freelance law-bender.' Crafty Corellian pirate. Rebel hero. Owns Millennium Falcon. Co-pilot Chewbacca promised him 'life-debt.' Has bounty on head.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Once during battle, may use 1 Force to cancel your previous destiny and draw again. Adds 2 to power of any starship he pilots. On Millenium Falcon, also adds 2 to maneuver and may draw one battle destiny if not able to otherwise.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Smuggler and Rebel starships use black market armor plating and deflector shields to withstand enemy fire. Expensive but life-saving modifications.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If the opponent just fired one starship weapon against one of your starships, each opponent's weapon destiny involved is reduced by 2.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Leia sent a hologram plea, 'General Kenobi, years ago you served my father in the Clone Wars. Now he begs you to help him in his struggle against the Empire.'

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If ObiWan is at a site you control, he may apply any amount of his ability toward drawing a battle destiny at any other location. Ability he uses this way cannot be used again this turn. OR One Rebel may move as a 'react' to an adjacent battle site.

card.name: How Did We Get Into This Mess?

property.name: Lore
property.value: Stranded in the Dune Sea, R2-D2 insisted on heading into rocky canyons where he thought settlements were likely to exist. Threepio had other ideas

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If one of your droids is at the Dune Sea or where there is a Scomp link, use 1 Force to discard your entire hand to your Used Pile. Draw the same number of cards from your Reserve Deck. Draw one extra card if droid is C-3PO or R2-D2.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Grows fruits and vegetables. Very efficient water use. Often underground. Feeds moisture farm families, but excess vegetables are often sold at markets

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force to deploy on any exterior Tatooine site. Cannot be moved. When activating Force, the first card may be drawn directly into your hand. If a Vaporator is on the table, the second card may also be drawn directly into your hand.

property.name: Lore
property.value: 'We'll be safe enough once we make the jump to hyperspace.' A starship in hyperspace cannot be tracked unless a homing beacon has been hidden aboard

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Cancel a battle just initiated at any system by moving all your starships there away (at normal use of the Force).

property.name: Lore
property.value: Leia led an unorthodox escape into a 'garbage masher' on the detention level. 'What an incredible smell you've discovered!'

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If Trash Compactor is on table, cancel any battle just initiated at another Death Star site by moving (for free) all your characters involved to the Trash Compactor.

property.name: Lore
property.value: After escaping Detention Block AA-23. Rebels found themselves in the trash compactor. Leia point out, 'It could be worse.' It soon was.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If you must lose Force for any reason, reduce the loss by X amount by using X Force.

card.name: I've Got A Bad Feeling About This

property.name: Lore
property.value: Han's smuggling adventures in Corporate Sector and Hutt Space put him in many tight scrapes. He's about to be in another

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Despite your bad feelings, initiate a battle at a location where you have less power than the opponent. If you lose the battle, no result. If you win the battle, opponent's losses are doubled. (If Han is present, losses are tripled.)

property.name: Lore
property.value: Pesky scavenger species. One meter tall. Trade language nearly unintelligible...unless Jawas wish to be understood. Sometimes build massive stone fortresses.

property.name: GameText
property.value: * to deploy requires 1 Force from each players' Force Pile. Cannot deploy otherwise. Deploy only on Tatooine, but may move elsewhere.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Three Jawas take a cool, energy-saving nap in the noon-day suns at Mos Eisley.

property.name: GameText
property.value: To deploy (on your side of table), requires 3 Force from both players' Force Piles. Cannot deploy otherwise. All your Jawas are forfeit +1.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Elegant sword of pure energy. 'This is the weapon of a Jedi Knight. Not as clumsy or as random as a blaster. A lightsaber can be dangerous to an unskilled user.'

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: CHARACTER WEAPON

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use X Force to deploy on any warrior where X = (7 - warrior's ability), and you may then use as follows: Add 1 to Force drain where present. OR Target a character by using X Force. Draw 2 destiny. Character hit if total destiny > ability.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Jedi Knights inspired allies on the battlefield through bravery and heroism. Obi-Wan's presence encouraged the Rebels and gave them a chance to escape the Death Star.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If one of your Jedi is present during any battle, use 1 Force to cause all other Rebels there to battle at double power.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Piloted Red 6 at Battle of Yavin. Specializes in strafing runs. Served in Tierfon Yellow Aces squadron at Tierfon Rebel Outpost. Free trader from Bestine system.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Adds 2 to power of any starship he pilots. On Red 6 also adds 1 to maneuver and draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Young female Chadra-Fan. Thief. Guardian is Muftak. Abandoned on Tatooine by slavers. Loves intoxicating juri juice. Once robbed Jabba the Hutt's dwelling in Mos Eisley.

property.name: GameText
property.value: During your control phase, may target one opponent's weapon or device at same site. Draw destiny. If destiny < target's destiny number, Kabe 'steals' device to use, or weapon to hold and transfer (for free) to a warrior at same site.

property.name: Lore
property.value: A female Quor'sav, a warm-blooded, avian/monotreme species. 3.5 meters tall. Over-protective mother. Freelance pilot. Has custom-built ship with tall corridors. Lays eggs.

property.name: GameText
property.value: If both players draw one battle destiny involving Kal, and yours is higher, the opponent's destiny is reduced to zero. Landspeed =3. Adds 2 to power of capital starships she pilots. Legs too long to board starfighters or enclosed vehicles.

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: If you control, Kessel run is prevented (cancelled).

property.name: LightLocationText
property.value: If you control, Force drain +1 here.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Planet Kessel has infamous glitterstim spice mines attracting smugglers and pirates. A 'Kessel run' is a long, dangerous hyper-route they must travel quickly.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: UTINNI EFFECT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on Kessel. Target one of your smugglers at another system. X = parsec distance between the two systems. When target reaches Kessel, opponent draws destiny. If =0, starship is lost. Otherwise, by returning to first system, 'retrieve' X Lost Force. Lose Utinni Effect.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Dejarik hologram of venomous swamp creature from Noe'ha'on. Keen senses of smell and vision. Dangerous hunter. Lays eggs - hundreds of ravenously hungry hatchlings.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on your side of table. For each unit of ability you have present during a battle, you may use 1 Force to raise your total power by 1. Ability used in this way cannot also be used to draw destiny.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Using Jedi skill, Obi-Wan Kenobi imitated perfectly the mournful howl of the dangerous krayt dragon to scare Tusken Raiders away from Luke Skywalker.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If Obi-Wan is defending a battle alone at a site, add 1 to power and add one battle destiny. OR if any other Rebel with ability >2 is defending a battle alone at a site, add one battle destiny.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Leesub is a Qiraash (near-human). Enslaved as child. Limited precognition. Selected by Imperial High Inquisitor Tremayne as Force adept. Escaped and hiding in Mos Eisley

property.name: GameText
property.value: Once each turn during your control phase, may use 1 Force to guess a card type and point to a card in opponent's hand. Card must be shown. If guessed correctly, card is lost.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Strong-willed princess from Alderaan. Youngest Imperial Senator ever. Used diplomatic immunity to spy for Rebels. Led relief effort on Ralltir.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Adds 1 to power of each Rebel present with her at a Death Star site. 'Diplomatic' immunity to attrition <2

property.name: Lore
property.value: 'It's not over yet!'

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If Leia is lost, use 1 Force to retrieve her from the Lost Pile. OR Use 3 Force to search through your Reserve Deck and take Leia into your hand. Shuffle deck, cut and replace.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Defender sporting blaster, made by Drearian Defense Conglomerate. Intended for personal defense or small-game hunting. Short range. Low power. Carries energy for 50 shots.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: CHARACTER WEAPON

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force to deploy on Leia, 2 on any other warrior. May target for free. Draw destiny. Character hit if destiny-1 > ability. Vehicle hit if destiny-1 > maneuver or armor. If hit by Leia, target's forfeit =0.

property.name: Lore
property.value: System of enclosed high-speed vertical and horizontal transport cylinders. Used in space stations, large starships, Death Stars, etc.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: TRANSPORT VEHICLE

property.name: GameText
property.value: May carry 4 passengers. Deploy and move only at interior mobile sites. May move without presence aboard. Also, may move as a 'react' only to a battle or Force drain (if within range).

property.name: Lore
property.value: A Jedi learns not only to wield a lightsaber, but how to channel the Force to increase skill and control the lightsaber's damage.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on any character with ability >2 and a lightsaber. That character is power +3 in battles or may add 1 to Force drain where present. Effect is lost if character loses lightsaber.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Armored military droid which specializes in laying explosive mines. Originally intended to set charges inside ore and spice mines, but has also been converted for military use.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: MINING DROID

property.name: GameText
property.value: Lays mines. OR At any time during your turn, may use 1 Force to 'defuse' (lose) any one mine at same site.

property.name: Lore
property.value: 'It looks like I'm going nowhere.'

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If Luke is lost, use 1 Force to retrieve him from the Lost Pile. OR Use 3 Force to search through your Reserve Deck and take Luke into your hand. Shuffle deck, cut and replace.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Son of Anakin Skywalker. Student of Obi-Wan Kenobi. Honed piloting skills while bullseyeing womp rats in Beggar's Canyon aboard T-16 skyhopper

property.name: GameText
property.value: You may activate 1 extra Force each turn if Luke is present at any non-Tattoine location. Adds 3 to power of any starship he pilots. On Red 5, also adds 2 to maneuver. Immune to attrition <3.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Skywalker's SoroSuub. Common open-air transport. Top speed 250 km per hour. Repulsorlift drive keeps it suspended one meter above ground, even when parked.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: TRANSPORT VEHICLE

property.name: GameText
property.value: May carry 3 passengers. Moves free if Luke aboard. Also, may move as a 'react' only to a battle or Force drain (if within range).

property.name: Lore
property.value: Dejarik game uses holograms of mythological and real creatures from across the galaxy. The hulking Mantellian savrip is a nasty predator from Ord Mantell.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 3 Force to deploy on your side of table (free if C-3PO on table). After losing any battle: character, starships and vehicles may be forfeited directly from your hand (for forfeit value) to reduce attrition or battle damage.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Modified YT-1300 freighter. Owned by Lando Calrissian until won by Han in a sabacc game. 26.7 meters long. 'She may not look like much, but she's got it where it counts.'

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: STARFIGHTER: MODIFIED LIGHT FREIGHTER

property.name: GameText
property.value: May add 2 pilots and 2 passengers. Immune to attrition <5 if Han, Chewie or Lando piloting. Has ship-docking capability. Must have pilot aboard to use power, maneuver or hyperspeed.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Male Ithorian, from a tree-loving race derogatorily nicknamed, 'Hammerheads.' Master of animal husbandry and horticulture. Former herd ship leader. Rebel spy.

property.name: GameText
property.value: During your control phase, may snare (steal) one Bantha, Dewback, Wampa, Rancor, Bubo, or Dragonsnake present at same site.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Obi-Wan used Jedi 'affect mind' power to convince stormtroopers, 'These aren't the droids you're looking for.'

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force to temporarily suspend a battle just initiated at a site where one of your Jedi is present. Draw destiny. That number of opponent's characters with ability =1 (your choice) must move away (for free), or are lost. Battle continues.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Four-armed smuggler and pilot for hire. A Morseerian male. Breathes methane. Former fighter pilot. He can take you anywhere for the right price.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Any or all of your characters at one site may attempt to hire transport to any other site. Draw destiny to determine Nabrun's asking price. Accept transport by using that much Force. Decline transport and Nabrun leaves (to Lost Pile).

property.name: Lore
property.value: Blast doors seal off compartments during battles, hull ruptures or as security measures. Thick doors repel blaster rifle shots.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Cancel a battle just initiated at a site where any Rebel of ability ^gt;2 is present, by moving all your characters there away (at normal use of the Force).

property.name: Lore
property.value: Tatoo I and Tatoo II, twin suns of Tatooine, create a harsh desert environment, but provide spectacular sunsets. At night, many dangers emerge from the shadows.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on any planet system to cause 'night-time conditions' at related sites. During battles there, both sides add one destiny to power only. Spies deploy free to sites under 'night-time conditions'.

property.name: Lore
property.value: 'You can't win Darth. If you strike me down I shall become more powerful than you can possibly imagine.' Obi-Wan's sacrifice gave the Rebels time to escape.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If opponent has just deployed a character, sacrifice (out of play) from table one of your characters with the same power (even a captured character). You may retrieve Force from Lost Pile equal to your sacrificed character's forfeit value.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Jedi Knight. Trained by Yoda. Friend of Bail Organa. General Kenobi became a hero of the Old Republic during the Clone Wars. Mentor of Anakin and Luke Skywalker.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: JEDI KNIGHT

property.name: GameText
property.value: When present at the start of a battle, may use 1 Force to cause one opponent's character of ability =1 (your choice) to move away (for free), or that character is immediately lost. Immune to attrition <5.

property.name: Lore
property.value: A symbol of the noble Jedi and his mysterious powers.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 2 Force to deploy on a Rebel or alien. Immune to attrition <5. Also, when present at the start of a battle, may use 1 Force to cause one opponent's character of ability =1 (your choice) to move away (for free), or that character is immediately lost.

property.name: Lore
property.value: 'An elegant weapon for a more civilized time.' Miniaturized power cell. Uses rare crystals to focus the lightblade. This lightsaber was personally built by Obi-Wan.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: CHARACTER WEAPON

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy only on Obi-Wan (for free) and you may use as follows: Add 1 Force to Force drain where present. OR Target a character for free. Draw two destiny. Character hit, and its forfeit =0, if total destiny > ability.

property.name: Lore
property.value: 'That old man's just a crazy wizard.' Obi-Wan lived in Tatooine's deserts for years...ready for the right moment to act.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force if any of your characters (except Obi-Wan) was just forfeited from a Tatooine site. Mysterious 'crazy wizard' steps in and revives (redeploy for free) that character back to same site.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Luke and Leia nearly fell over the retracted bridge across the Death Star's central core while trying to elude stormtroopers. They were soon trapped on the precipice.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force and target one Rebel (on table) of ability >2. Choose a number from 1 to 6. You may retreive that amount from your Lost Pile if you now draw one destiny > chosen number. If you fail, Rebel is lost.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Following her father Bail Organa's instructions, Leia placed the Death Star plans into R2-D2, hoping that they could be delivered safely to Alderaan by Obi-Wan Kenobi.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: UTINNI EFFECT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on Alderaan. Target one Rebel at Tatooine. When target reaches Utinni Effect, retrieve lost Force for each Force-Attuned character you have on table, two for each Force-Sensitive or Jedi. Lost Utinni Effect.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Black market sensor-stealth arrays can be used to hide starships from enemy sensor scans. Stellar interference can naturally shield a starship for surprise attacks

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If opponent has just initiated a battle at a system where you have a starship with maneuver >3, use 1 Force to add one battle destiny.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Guardian of Luke Skywalker. Husband of Beru Lars. Brother of Obi- Wan Kenobi. Farmer of moisture. Disapprover of Luke's desire to leave Tatooine.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploys free at Lars' Moisture Farm. Power +2 if at same site as Beru Lars or one Vaporator. If lost during the opponent's turn, Luke is power +3 until the end of your next turn.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Cornered by Imperial troops, Han's gambler reflexes led him to do what comes naturally - attack! Surprise assaults work...sometimes

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If opponent just initiated a battle where opponent has more than double your power, draw up to 3 cards from your Reserve Deck. Of those 3, deploy anywhere (for free) any characters, starships, vehicles, devices or weapons. Any others are lost.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Luke and Han took the armor suits from fallen stormtroopers and used them as both protection and disguise to penetrate the detention cell block aboard the Death Star.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: UTINNI EFFECT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on a Death Star site where a Stormtrooper was just lost. Target one of your characters not on Death Star. When target reaches Utinni Effect, steal 'armor'. Character gains spy skill, power +2, forfeit +2 and immunity to weapon destiny <6.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Piloted Gold 5 at Battle of Yavin. Real name Davish Krail. Veteran pilot. Flew fighters for two decades. Wingman of Gold Leader.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Adds 2 to power of any starship he pilots. On Gold 5 also adds 1 to maneuver and draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Powerful ballistic projectiles. Carries proton-scattering energy warheads. Short range. Pierces energy shields, but blocked by particle shields

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: STARSHIP WEAPON

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force to deploy on your X-wing, Y-wing or B-wing. May target a starship using 1 Force. Draw destiny. Target hit if destiny > defense value.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Starship blaster, often slung in turret mounts to take advantage of light weight and quick targeting motions. Installed on many starships including the Millennium Falcon.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: STARSHIP WEAPON

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 2 Force to deploy on your Corellian Corvette or Falcon. May target a starship using 1 Force. Draw destiny. Add 1 if targeting a starfighter. Target hit if total destiny > defense value.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Typical starfighter pilot assistant. Contains ten coordinates for hyperspace jumps. Built-in tools and computer interfaces. R2-X2 was assigned to Red 10 at Yavin Base.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: ASTROMECH DROID

property.name: GameText
property.value: While aboard any starfighter, adds 1 to power, maneuver, and hyperspeed.

property.name: Lore
property.value: One of numerous vehicle computer operation droids, manufactured by Industrial Automation. This unit, R4-E1, is a companion of BoShek. Rambunctious. Fiercely independent.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: VEHICLE DROID

property.name: GameText
property.value: While aboard a non-creature vehicle, adds 1 to power, maneuver and landspeed. May drive transport vehicles.

property.name: Lore
property.value: One of numerous vehicle computer operation droids, manufactured by Industrial Automation. This unit, R4-E1, is a companion of BoShek. Rambunctious. Fiercely independent.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If you have at least one vehicle or starship on table, use 1 Force to glance at the cards in the opponent's hand for 10 seconds. You may move each Jawa (except Datcha) and Tusken Raider you find there to opponent's Used Pile

property.name: Lore
property.value: While being chased through the Death Star, Luke and Leia disabled the blast doors behind them in order to slow down pursuing stormtroopers.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force to prevent any character or starship just deployed by the opponent from battling or moving for the remainder of this turn.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Galen Torg was selected for honor guard duty during ceremony following the Battle of Yavin. He is typical of the hard-working, unsung heros in the Rebel Alliance.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Cannot move. * Power =0 during an offensive battle, but Power =4 when defending a battle.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Lt. Wenton Chan, from Corulag, is typical of the new pilots who volunteer for dangerous duty in the Rebellion. Few have Academy training. Most learn piloting on skyhoppers.

property.name: GameText
property.value: * Power =0 when at any site, but adds 2 to power of any starship he pilots.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Rebel strategists worked under master tactician General Dodonna. They devised an unorthodox battle plan to destroy the Death Star at the Battle of Yavin.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force to deploy at Massassi War Room or any docking bay. Adds X to total power of your starships at the related system, where X = the number of your starships present.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Rebels rely on hidden 'cells' of undercover operatives. Striking from hidden bases, troops or starfighters can arrive in a battle zone at any time.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If opponent outnumbers you in total characters and starships on table, use 1 Force to draw destiny. That number of Rebel Troopers and/or Y-wings may be retrieved from Lost Pile.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Corellian Corvette trooper Ensign Chad Hilse, an Alderaanian, typifies the loyal Rebel volunteers dedicated to defeating the Empire. Trained in starship and ground combat.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploys free to same site as one of your Rebels with ability >2.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Lead fighter of Red Squadron at Battle of Yavin. Flown by Garven Dreis. Also served at main Rebel base on Dantooine.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: STARFIGHTER: X-WING

property.name: GameText
property.value: May add 1 pilot. Must have a pilot aboard to use power, maneuver or hyperspeed.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Biggs Darklighter's fighter at Battle of Yavin. Part of Ecliptic Evaders squadron near Sullust until transferred to Yavin Base.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: STARFIGHTER: X-WING

property.name: GameText
property.value: May add 1 pilot and 1 astromech. Must have pilot aboard to use power, maneuver or hyperspeed.

property.name: Lore
property.value: X-wing pilot Garven Dreis. Led Red Squadron at the Battle of Yavin, and fired an unsuccessful shot at the Death Star thermal exhaust port. Served at Dantooine Rebel base.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Adds 2 to power of any starship he pilots. On Red 1, also adds 1 to maneuver and draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise. Forfeit +1 to all other Red Squadron pilots at same location.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Fits in a special socket on a droid's body. When installed, restricts actions of droids, forcing them to follow orders. Can be operated remotely by a 'caller.'

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on any droid at any site. Droid cannot move and cannot utilize its 'game text.' During your deploy phase, Restraining Bolt may betransferred (for free) to another droid at same site.

property.name: Lore
property.value: The Empire is too bureaucratic to deploy troops efficiently except under favorable circumstances. Rebel actions across the galaxy force Imperials to split their forces.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 3 Force to deploy on opponent's side of table. All opponent's warriors are deploy +1.

property.name: Lore
property.value: 'Where did you dig up that old fossil?' 'I don't think he exists anymore.' 'Surely he must be dead by now.' 'I can't believe he's gone.' 'Oh, he's not dead, not yet.' Obi's back!

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If Obi-Wan is lost, use 1 Force to retrieve him from the Lost Pile. OR Use 3 Force to search through your Reserve Deck and take Obi-Wan into your hand. Shuffle deck, cut and replace.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Spies and informants gave Rebels vital data to plan strategic turnabouts, create local insurgencies, and hamper Imperial activities.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 3 Force to deploy on any location. Rotate the location so that icons and game texts switch direction. (If Expand the Empire present, it also switches.) If Revolution later cancelled, location rotates back again.

property.name: Lore
property.value: A Bimm trader and smuggler of starship weapons. Trusts no one. Does business with anyone. Teaches smuggler apprentices. Has mastered Jawa language.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on any non-smuggler to give that character smuggler skill. OR Deploy on any smuggler. That character is power +1. (Immune to Alter.)

property.name: Lore
property.value: Saurin female from planet Durkteel. Bodyguard of Hrchek, a Saurin droid trader. Sai'torr will teach battle skills to those who prove themselves worthy.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on any non-warrior character (except droids) to give that character [[Warrior]] skill. OR Deploy on any warrior. That character is power +1. (Immune to Alter.)

property.name: Lore
property.value: Warren-like enclosed homes for Jawa tribes. Protects against Tatooine predators. Originally mining vehicles. Jawas claimed them when mines abandoned. No two look alike.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: TRANSPORT VEHICLE

property.name: GameText
property.value: May carry 8 passengers. Must deploy at a Tatooine site. May relocate only to planet sites. Each Jawa at same exterior site is forfeit +1.

property.name: Lore
property.value: A computer connection access port used mainly by droids to plug into database networks and locate information, evaluate threats, execute diagnostics or perform maintenance.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If one of your 'R' unit droids is at any Scomp link, you may: glance at the cards in any Reserve Deck for 20 seconds. Shuffle, Cut and Replace. OR If also at a Death Star site, cancel We're All Gonna Be A Lot Thinner or Boring Conversation Anyway.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Users of the Force can sense impending danger by feeling the way the Force flows in others. Cataclysmic events can be sensed (as when Obi- Wan felt Alderaan's destruction).

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Cancel one Interrupt (or one 'react') by drawing a destiny < ability of your highest-ability character on table. OR Cancel one Alter card just played.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Lak Sivrak is a typical Shistavanen male. Ferocious, but not aggressive. Often trained as scouts at Imperial academies, but they despise the ambitions of the New Order.

property.name: GameText
property.value: May move to an adjacent site as a 'react'.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Luke and Leia escaped to an unused portion of the Death Star, evading security checkpoints. At a retracted bridge, they swung across on a grappling line through enemy fire.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If Luke and Leia are in a battle together, you may add two battle destiny. OR Cancel Imperial Barrier or Wrong Turn or Retract The Bridge.

property.name: Lore
property.value: As a smuggler, Solo must always be alert for trouble, even when appearing relaxed. Bounty hunters are eager to claim the price on the Corellian pirate's head.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If Han is defending a battle alone at a site, add two battle destiny. OR If any alien is defending a battle alone at a site, add one battle destiny.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Typical old model Courier Landspeeder such as the one used by Lars family for trips to Anchorhead. Has cargo compartment. Enclosed seating

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: TRANSPORT VEHICLE

property.name: GameText
property.value: May carry 4 passengers. Moves free if Owen Lars, Beru Lars, or Luke aboard. Also, may move as a 'react' only to a battle or Force drain (if within range).

property.name: Lore
property.value: Spacesport Speeders buys, trades and sells floater. Wioslea is known as a shrewd bargainer. Luke got 2,000 credits for his X-24 speeder.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Sell one of your vehicles or droids at Mos Eisley or same site as Wioslea. Draw two destiny (three destiny if vehicle is Luke's X-34 Landspeeder). The total is the 'offer' which you much accept. Activate that much Force; then vehicle or droid is lost.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Han's 'special modifications' for the Millennium Falcon included security mechanisms, deflector shields, hull plating, faster hyperdrive and enhanced weapons.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force to deploy on any starship to add 2 to its armor or maneuver. If on Millenium Falcon with Han, Lando or Chewie piloting, also adds 2 to power and forfeit.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Imperial troops with strict orders are often caught off-guard by innovative Rebel ambushes, sneak attacks, or sabotage efforts.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force to cancel a Force drain at one location. Draw one destiny for each character, starship and vehicle the opponent has present. Compare your destiny total to opponent's power total. Player with lowest total loses Force equal to the difference.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Military version of a 'remote.' Programmed to stalk specific targets or secondary targets. Heat and light sensors track with fatal accuracy. Can stow away on starships.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: AUTOMATED WEAPON

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force to deploy on opponent's side at any unoccupied site. Moves during your control phase (like a character) at normal use of the Force. When at same location as Tagge or warrior of ability <3, choose one to be immediately lost. Seeker also lost.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Muftak is a typical male Talz from Alzoc III, a system enslaved by the Empire. A Talz's second pair of eyes provide excellent night vision. Muftak is a friend and protector of Kabe.

property.name: GameText
property.value: May forfeit in place of any other character hit by a weapon at same site, restoring that character to normal. Any Talz is power +2 under 'nighttime conditions'.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Specially designed for use on Rebel starfighters. Assists pilots on torpedo runs. Automatically locks on pre-programmed target points

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 2 Force to deploy on any starship. Adds 1 to starship's Maneuver. If this starship is using a weapon during a battle, you may fire that weapon twice, separately or combined. Subtract 1 from each destiny draw when firing.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Military version of a 'remote.' Programmed to stalk specific targets or secondary targets. Heat and light sensors track with fatal accuracy. Can stow away on starships.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: AUTOMATED WEAPON

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force to deploy on opponent's side at any unoccupied site. Moves during your control phase (like a character) at normal use of the Force. When at same location as Tarkin or alien of ability <3, choose one to be immediately lost. Seeker also lost.

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: If you control, for each of your starships here, your total power is +1 in battles at Tatooine sites.

property.name: LightLocationText
property.value: If you control, for each of your starships here, your total power is +1 in battles at Tattoine sites.

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: Your allies here except Tusken Raiders are each forfeit +1.

property.name: LightLocationText
property.value: Your aliens here are each power +1.

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: Your docking bay transit from here requires 2 Force.

property.name: LightLocationText
property.value: Your docking bay transit from here requires 1 Force.

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: Total ability of 6 or more required for you to draw battle destiny here.

property.name: LightLocationText
property.value: Your Jawas deplay here for 1 Force from you only, for free if Sandcrawler present.

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: Add 1 to each of your weapon destiny draws here.

property.name: LightLocationText
property.value: Beru Lars and Luke deploy -1 here.

property.name: LightLocationText
property.value: During your control phase, you may move free from here directly to Cantina (or vice versa).

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: If you control, force drain +1 here.

property.name: LightLocationText
property.value: Obi-Wan is deploy -3 here.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Survival gear, food and tools are stored in small compartments. Made from bantha hide. Used by Luke and other Tatooine inhabitants.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force to deploy on any Rebel or alien. While on Tatooine, that character's power and forfeit are +2.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Reference to 'One Who Creates,' used by droids in an almost religious way. C-3PO used phrase upon getting a much-needed cleansing oil bath.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force during opponent's control phase if you have a droid on the table and were drained of at least 5 Force. Draw destiny. That number of cards are randomly selected and retrieved from your Lost Pile.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Figrin D'an and the Modal Nodes play at the Cantina with a distinctive rocking motion. When Luke arrived, they were playing one of their favorite songs, 'Mad About Me.'

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Shuffle any player's Reserve Deck or Lost Pile or Used Pile.

card.name: The Force Is Strong With This One

property.name: Lore
property.value: Luke's piloting skills and Force abilities made his X-wing a difficult target for Darth Vader as they raced down the Death Star trench.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If Luke and an Imperial with ability >2 are involved in the same battle, you may add one battle destiny (add two destiny if Imperial is Vader).

property.name: Lore
property.value: 'We seem to be made to suffer. It's our lot in life.'

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Sacrifice (forfeit) a droid to cancel all attrition against you at same site this turn. OR Re-target an opponent's weapon to one of your droids at same site. If droid is lost, use original target's forfeit number.

property.name: Lore
property.value: A timer-activated explosive device designed to be placed by a mining droid. Typically used in ore and spice mines for demolition. Also has many military applications.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: AUTOMATED WEAPON

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on opponent's side at same site as one of your mining droids. 'Explodes' at beginning of your next turn. Draw destiny. That number of opponent's characters there are immediately lost (owner's choice). Timer Mine is also lost.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Expert traffic controllers coordinate launches faster than automated launch systems. Rebel bases scramble fighters quickly during Imperial attacks.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force to deploy on your side of table. During your control phase, you may return any cards from your hand to the top of your Used Pile.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Sand People use a special mask to reclaim exhaled moisture in the hot, harsh environment of Tatooine. Protects by filtering blowing sand and dispersing excess heat.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: UTINNI EFFECT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy on any Tatooine site where you have just won a battle. Target one of your characters not at Tatooine. Upon reaching, target takes mask. While on Tatooine, target's power and forfeit are +2 and has immunity to attrition of exactly 3.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Jawa trade language word for 'Come here!' Jawas work communally and scavenge for equipment.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If one of your Jawas is at the same location as any Utinni Effect, 'steal' that Utinni Effect into your hand, to use or lose as your own. OR Cancel any Interrupt or Effect with 'Jawa' in the card name.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Essential for life on desert planets. Condenses water vapor from atmosphere. Has purification filters and coolant tanks. Protects against drought and harsh conditions.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 1 Force to deploy on any Tatooine site. Cannot be moved. Protects all characters at same site, or an adjacent site, from Gravel Storm.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Each Rebel soldier is driven by bravery and a belief in the Rebel Alliance's ideal of freedom. Courageous and quick-thinking Rebels often defeat Imperial legions.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: LOST INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If any warrior is defending a battle alone at a site, add one battle destiny. OR If Leia is defending a battle alone at a site, add two battle destiny.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Unique treadwell droid cobbled together by Jawas. Now owned by the DeMaals, proprietors of Docking Bay 94. Nicknamed 'bantha' for its slow and stubborn personality.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: MAINTENANCE DROID

property.name: GameText
property.value: All your vehicles and droids at same location are immune to attrition <2. Also, if 'bantha' droid is at a docking bay, all your starfighters at the related system are immune to attrition <3 and may cancel Lateral Damage.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Threepio's many misadventures often threatened his continued operation. The luckless protocol droid developed a healthy sense of cynicism, and a keen grasp of the obvious.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: USED INTERRUPT

property.name: GameText
property.value: If you have less than 15 Life Force, play during opponent's control phase. For remainder of turn, each time you must lose Force, the loss is cut in half (round up). If R2-D2 or C-3PO on table, round down.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Bought Luke's Landspeeder for Spaceport Speeders. A Vuvrian female. Gambler who owes Jabba 1,000 credits in wagering debts. Speaks many languages.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Where present, during your control phase, may use 1 Force to target an opponent's vehicle or droid for 'purchase'. Draw destiny. If destiny > target's destiny number, 'pay' (use) Force equal to target's deploy number and take target.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Model T-65 by Incom Corporation. Delivered to Alliance by defecting design team. 12.5 meters long. Wings deploy in an 'X' position for better weapons coverage.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: STARFIGHTER: X-WING

property.name: GameText
property.value: Permanent pilot aboard provides ability of 1.

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: If you control, for each of your starships here, your total power is +1 in battles at Yavin 4 sites.

property.name: LightLocationText
property.value: If you control, for each of your starships here, your total power is +1 in battles at Yavin 4 sites.

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: Your docking bay transit from here requires 2 Force.

property.name: LightLocationText
property.value: Your docking bay transit from here is free.

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: If you control, Force drain +1 here.

property.name: LightLocationText
property.value: A Rebel alone here battles at power +2 and is immune to attrition.

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: If you control, Force drain +1 here.

property.name: LightLocationText
property.value: If this is your starting location, Light Side goes first in game.

property.name: DarkLocationText
property.value: If you initiate a battle here, add one battle destiny.

property.name: LightLocationText
property.value: If you control with a leader here, all Stormtroopers and TIEs on table are forfeit -1.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Rebel sentries are stationed on raised sensor platforms. On watch for Imperial scouts and other hazards, they supplement data gathered by Yavin Base's main sensors.

property.name: GameText
property.value: Use 2 Force to deploy at any Yavin 4 site. Declare one of the following to affect that site and adjacent sites while 'sentry' present: Opponent's deploy +1. OR Opponent's ability required for battle destiny +1. OR Your total power +1.

property.name: Lore
property.value: An Imperial bureaucrat with high security clearance who resigned and fled in remorse after the occupation of his home planet, Ralltir. Now a fugitive from the ISB.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: UTINNI EFFECT

property.name: GameText
property.value: Deploy at any location. You may move Mig like a character. Target an opponent's character, who may apprehend (cancel) Mig by reaching same location. Until then, during all battles at same and adjacent sites to Mig, opponent's total power is -1.

property.name: Lore
property.value: Rugged Rebel Alliance fighter. BTL-S3 has room for a second pilot to assist weapons operations. 16 meters long. Built by Koensayr.

property.name: FirstBox
property.value: STARFIGHTER: Y-WING

property.name: GameText
property.value: May add 1 pilot or passenger. Permanent pilot aboard provides ability of 1.
